text: Kevin S. Towers (November 11, 1961 â€“ January 30, 2018) was an American executive. He worked with Major League Baseball. He served as the General Manager of the San Diego Padres from 1995 to 2009 and for the Arizona Diamondbacks from 2010 to 2014. He was born in Medford, Oregon. Towers died on January 30, 2018 in San Diego, California of thyroid cancer at the age of 56. ==References== ==Other websites== *Baseball America Executive Database Category:1961 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from thyroid cancer Category:Cancer deaths in San Diego County Category:Businesspeople from Oregon Category:Sportspeople from Oregon Category:People from Medford, Oregon
title: Kevin Towers
